thread.section_title: FabKids Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FabKids | fabkids.com
thread.title: Kate

author: Kate
title: Kate
text: I have been so pleased with all of the clothing that I have ordered, but the shipping has been taking weeks. This can be so frustrating, however, I can understand if the truck is stuck because of bad weather. But I have not been notified of anything like that. I would recommend FabKids to anyone. The quality you get is much better than any I have found without paying over $100 or more per piece.
